scripts.vite: pnpm --filter remote dev & pnpm --filter remote2 dev & wait-on tcp:3000 tcp:3001 && pnpm --filter host dev
scripts.vite-remote: pnpm --filter host dev & pnpm --filter remote2 dev & wait-on tcp:3001 tcp:3002 && pnpm --filter remote dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter remote build && pnpm --filter remote2 build && pnpm --filter host build
scripts.preview: pnpm build && pnpm --filter remote preview & wait-on tcp:3000 && pnpm --filter remote2 preview & wait-on tcp:3000 tcp:3001 && pnpm --filter host preview && pnpm --filter host preview
